readable.title: 795081510_53fd17d101
readable.content: A couple hold each other , standing on a ferry , looking out at a ferry . A couple standing on the deck of a boat watching the water . A man embraces a woman as they look over the railing out over the water at a ship . Couple overlooking a metal rail with water and a boat int he background . The couple is together looking at the large ship in the ocean .
